00001 @interface NSObject (SafeSending)
00002 
00003 /* This method may be used to safely send a message to the
00004  superclass of an instance, when you are not sure whether
00005  or not the selector is defined in any of the superclasses.
00006  The argument list "firstArg, ..." must end with a nil.
00007  Limitation: Selector must return void or an id. */
00022 - (id)safelySendSuperSelector:(SEL)selector
00023                                         arguments:firstArg, ... ;

00039                                  withObject:(id)object ;
